definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: The difference between Kosovo and South Ossetia has been starker still in the war’s aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 科索沃與南奧塞梯事件的區別在戰後表現得更加明顯。

sentences.english: Georgian and South Ossetian officials have accused each other of initiating the hostilities.
sentences.chinese: 格魯吉亞和南奧塞梯官員相互指責對方挑起敵對行動。

sentences.english: Russia’s recognition of South Ossetia and Abkhazia has made things worse.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯對南奧塞梯和阿布哈茲的承認讓情況變得更糟。

sentences.english: Vladikavkaz is the capital of North Ossetia.
sentences.chinese: 弗拉季高加索是北奧塞梯的首府。

sentences.english: Mr. Putin said there were signs of genocide against the Ossetian people.
sentences.chinese: 普京說，有跡象表明對南奧塞梯人進行了種族清洗。

sentences.english: Russia supports the separatists and has peacekeepers in the region.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯支持南奧塞梯獨立，並在該地區派有維和人員。

sentences.english: He also backs the independence of the breakaway Georgian regions of Abkhazia and South Ossetia.
sentences.chinese: 他也是格魯吉亞獨立地區阿布哈茲和南奧塞梯的後盾。
